Title: ARC Resources to supply ExxonMobil with LNG from Canada’s Cedar LNG project
Description: Canadian gas producer ARC Resources has signed a long-term sale and purchase agreement with ExxonMobil LNG Asia Pacific, an affiliate of ExxonMobil, to supply LNG from the planned 3.3 mtpa Cedar LNG project in Kitimat, British Columbia.
Author: CK

Title: Last cargo from Russia's sanctioned Portovaya LNG terminal remains undelivered
Description: The last LNG cargo loaded at Russia’s 1.5 mtpa Portovaya terminal in mid-February remains undelivered, underscoring the challenges sanctioned Russian LNG terminals face in securing buyers.
Author: CK

Title: PV Gas to expand LNG capacity at Thi Vai this month, plans to install an FSRU at Vung Tau
Description: State-owned PetroVietnam GAS will expand regasification capacity at its 1.1 mtpa Thi Vai LNG terminal in Vietnam’s Ba Ria-Vung Tau province this month, with this aimed at bolstering power supply amid declining domestic gas production.
Author: CK
